Minecraft Games – Play Free on Spiels

Minecraft games are extremely popular online, where you can find various spinoffs and clones, map-based adventure games, and element crafting games based on this best-selling title. Developed by Markus Persson, Minecraft combines creativity, adventure and the freedom to set your own goals in the game. You can spend your time building or recreating complex constructions, but you can also embark on an adventure exploring your surroundings or fighting monsters. You can find our full collection of building games on this page.

How to play Minecraft

Minecraft is a “sandbox” game, which refers to the way kids play in a sandbox: they can make up their own goals, build whatever they want, and destroy what they built when they do want to use the same space and materials to try something different. In Minecraft, there isn’t a single predetermined goal to achieve, and players have a great deal of freedom to choose how they want to interact with their environment. There are different game modes and difficulty settings that allow you to tailor the gameplay to your liking.

Minecraft mobs

Many of the games listed on this page are geared towards either survival mode or creative play mode. In creative mode, one can access resources, tools, and buildings through the inventory menu without having to deal with enemy creatures and the need to forage. In adventure mode, the environment can kill your character and the game spawns numerous mobs. Mobs are mobile, computer-controlled characters. During the day passive mobs spawn like pigs, cows and chickens that you can hunt and eat. At night, however, monsters appear: hostile mobs like zombies, exploding critters, skeletons and giant spiders.

Our Minecraft titles

We have many great Minecraft titles for you to explore. Some of our most popular titles include the creative game Mine Clone 4, in which you can choose between different areas and settings to explore, and the idle-based Grindcraft Remastered, in which you must use your crafting skills to acquire the tools and… Design elements needed to complete each world map. Craft your own skins in the game Skincraft or choose one of our many other fun titles to play!
